https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/w1oAJxkSCu47D6kmdKkmja8pQJx.jpg Experts say over the next hundred years the "perfect storm" of population growth, resource depletion and climate change could converge with catastrophic results. The scenarios in Earth 2100 are not a prediction of what will happen but rather a warning about what might happen. Earth 2100
